text: The city is ginormous but almost completely retaken by nature,
so much that you can't tell what city this is in.
Skyscrapers line the sky, beautiful, tall, and majestic.
The pavement is broken, covered in an unknown type of feces,
completely twisted brown.
The deeper you go, the more futuristic the city becomes.
Screens line the buildings and shattered office towers.
Everything is in rocky gray shambles, wires exposed to the elements.
Robotic limbs lie scattered on the ground, parts missing.
Sharpie marks are spread thinly over everything electronic.
You bend down to look at a better protected robot.
On it, it says:
"JOB TAKER"
"GO BACK TO WHENCE YOU CAME YOU MONSTERS"
"FUCKING CLANKERS"
Your scanner starts humming VIOLENTLY.
It whirrs as if excited, like a puppy.
You walk forward as the scanner continues to whirr.
You reach a metal building.
Despite the devastation around you, this building is still intact,
though heavily graffitied.
There are dents in the doors and signs of attempted entry.
Guns lie in puddles and along the cracked concrete.
You slowly walk toward the doors.
They swing open, surprising you immensely.
